scripts.compile: npm run compile --prefix external/incremental/compat && npm run compile --prefix external/incremental/common && npm run compile --prefix external/interop
scripts.release: npm run compile && npm run -C arkgen compile && npm run -C core compile && npm run -C linter compile && npm run -c arktscgen compile && npm run -C idlinter compile && node tools/release.mjs
scripts.sanity: npm run -C arkgen sanity && npm run -C linter run
